title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: strip-woven and ikat-dyed (warps resist-dyed before weaving)
description: Long strip of woven cotton with a simple pattern of closely spaced vertical and horizontal white lines on a dark brown ground, a strip of dark indigo blue edged with narrow white lines and warp ikat in white on blue.
